name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler
sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldSplit: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(split(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(split(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(split(
        ri!field, 
        ".")), 
      "[")),
    "]")),
  
  apply(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayConvertHandler(
      field: _
    ),
    local!fieldSplit
  )
)
